ingredients.item: 4 essential Waitrose smoked British back bacon rashers
300g essential Waitrose frozen baby broad beans
2½ tbsp essential Waitrose British half fat crème fraîche

instructions.step: Preheat the grill to high. Cook the potatoes in a pan of boiling water for 15 minutes. Shell the broad beans, defrosted, and add to the potatoes for the final 3 minutes of cooking.
Meanwhile, stir the parsley and dill into the crème fraîche. Place the bacon under the grill until very crisp, then chop into bite-sized pieces.
Drain the vegetables and, while still warm, toss in the herbed crème fraîche. Sprinkle with the crispy bacon and serve.
